title: VIT-AP Student Marketplace Platform
description: Full-stack marketplace web application enabling VIT-AP students to buy, sell, and trade items within the campus community with real-time messaging capabilities
longDescription: Developed a full-stack marketplace web application enabling VIT-AP students to buy, sell, and trade items within the campus community with real-time messaging capabilities. Implemented secure authentication and authorization using Clerk with role-based access control for students and administrators, including email domain validation for campus-exclusive access. Designed and built RESTful APIs for post management, conversation handling, and user profiles with PostgreSQL database integration using Neon serverless architecture. Created responsive UI components with real-time message notifications, image upload functionality via Cloudinary, and dynamic filtering by categories and hostels. Integrated middleware for protected routes, onboarding workflows, and implemented error boundaries for robust error handling and improved user experience.

title: Hybrid CNN-Transformer for Skin Texture Analysis
description: Hybrid CNN-Transformer architecture to analyze and classify skin textures with 82% test accuracy
longDescription: Implemented a Hybrid CNN-Transformer architecture combining convolutional layers for local features and transformer blocks for global context. Applied data preprocessing techniques including normalization and augmentation to improve generalization. Evaluated performance using accuracy and loss metrics; achieved 82% test accuracy.

title: Career Guidance Chatbot
description: AI-powered recommendation system for career suggestions using structured user profiling and LLM-based intent understanding
longDescription: Built a recommendation system for career suggestions using structured user profiling and data persistence mechanisms. Developed back-end using Flask and SQLAlchemy; managed analytics using AWS Lambda for performance reporting. Integrated Gemini API to enhance LLM-based intent understanding and improve recommendation accuracy.

title: AI-Powered Sentiment Analysis Platform
description: Deployed sentiment models combining lexicon and transformer-based methods for scalable, real-time insights from web reviews
longDescription: Deployed sentiment models combining lexicon and transformer-based methods for scalable, real-time insights from web reviews. Automated real-time web scraping to collect datasets and support competitor analysis. Created interactive dashboards with trend visualizations for decision-making.

title: Trip Planner & Blog Creator
description: LLM-powered itinerary generator with mapping and storytelling modules, integrating multi-source data for user personalization
longDescription: Developed an LLM-powered itinerary generator with mapping and storytelling modules, integrating multi-source data for user personalization. Enabled structured export of itineraries as PDFs for enhanced user experience and offline access.
